body_html: @mrry any plans to add a feature to remove dropout in the tensorflow graph transform tool? I am running into the issue that nvidia's tensorrt does not support the op, which forces me to manually remove the nodes. Or is there an easy way to do that already with optimizing for deployment?
body_text: @mrry any plans to add a feature to remove dropout in the tensorflow graph transform tool? I am running into the issue that nvidia's tensorrt does not support the op, which forces me to manually remove the nodes. Or is there an easy way to do that already with optimizing for deployment?
body: @mrry any plans to add a feature to remove dropout in the tensorflow graph transform tool? I am running into the issue that nvidia's tensorrt does not support the op, which forces me to manually remove the nodes. Or is there an easy way to do that already with optimizing for deployment?
